version_description: Global release!
Minor bug fixes for Monkey Knowledge, tower upgrades, achievements, and CHIMPS mode

-Cash drop fix
-All Monkeys not unlocking fix
-Monkey City free Dart Monkey fix
-Bloon Master Alchemist random life loss fixed
-Fit Farmers now unlocks in correct order
-Banana collection crash fixed
-Upgrade button on mini towers fixed
-Placeable Powers should be easier to place now
-Several Monkey Knowledge fixes

Another set of player reported and requested fixes - thanks for the feedback!
* Monkey Knowledge fixes
* Powers fixes
* Tutorial localization fixes
* Multiple tower fixes
Monkey Money map rewards fix

New content update!
-Brand New Hero: Captain Churchill
-New Intermediate Map: Firing Range
-Monkey Knowledge can now be toggled on or off
-Half Starting Cash mode changed to Half Cash mode
-Soulbind Wizard upgrade replaced by: Prince of Darkness
-Some aspect ratio issues fixed
-Permacharge buffed
-Save conflict data loss issue fixed
-Medals added for sub-modes
-Removable object price changes
-Banana farmer now more effective
-Obyn now has more to say
-Tier 5 buffs (Sniper, Boomerang, Glue)

Minor bug fixes for Half Cash mode and super wide aspect ratio issues
Bucc placement bug fixed
021 Sniper hat returned from lost and found
Berserker brew range bug fixed
Obyn range buff bug fixed

New content update!
-Brand New Hero: Benjamin
-New Advanced Map: High Finance
-Advanced Daily Challenges added!
-Mute Hero option available
-Daily Challenges now have more possible rulesets
-Spike Factory spikes will no longer clear at end of round in Apopalypse Mode
-Loading a save with Spike Storm crash fixed
-Round 100 reward display updated
-New Monkey Knowledge added
-Various bug fixes

-New Map: Downstream!
-Monkey Knowledge respec functionality added
-Max lives cap increased
-New Insta Monkey inventory screen added
-Glaive Lord, Apache Prime, Wizard Lord Phoenix and Prince of Darkness all buffed
-MOAB Mauler buffed
-Lots of other balance changes, see Patch Notes for full list
-Various bug fixes
-Aspect ratio support for iPhone XS, XSMax and XR.

Mega Map and Halloween Update!
-New Expert Map: Dark Castle 
-New Intermediate Map: Haunted 
-New Beginner Map: Frozen Over
-Enjoy a spooky Bloons Halloween event! Grab candy and unleash the Monkey Ghosts!
-Insta Monkeys now have an inventory under the Powers menu
-Quincy gets a new Skin! Check out Cyber Quincy on the Heroes screen
-Two new Powers added!
-Tech Bot can manage your activated abilities for you 
-Energizing Totem grants a rechargeable attack boost to Monkeys in its radius for a short time
-Revenge of the avatar portraits
-Continue Previous on Daily Challenges no longer crashes the game in certain cases

A few things needed some extra monkey attention!
- Save crashes due to platform changes fixed
- Striker Jones' Concussive Shot first shot fixed
- Juggernaut bounces improved
- Heli Pilot: MOAB Shove and Pursuit fixes
- Track placeable Powers issue fixed
- Tree Stump placement fixes

New Monkey Tower: Mortar Monkey!
-New Intermediate Map: Moon Landing
-New Expert Map: Quad
-Scientist Gwendolin Skin added
-Alchemist Berserker Brew does not last as long anymore
-Monkey Knowledge for the Mortar added
-Various balance changes
-Tier 5s buffed: Flying Fortress, Inferno Ring, Apache Prime, Super Mines
Fix for low memory crash on low spec devices.

Huge content update!
-Brand New Hero: Ezili, Voodoo Monkey
-Race Events are here! Can you win the top badges?
-New Beginner Map: Alpine Run
-New Advanced Map: Peninsula
-The monkeys are busy preparing festive decorations and events!
-Various bug fixes and balance changes, see in-game Patch Notes for full list

Minor bug fixes for the holiday update
Holiday update includes:
-Brand New Hero: Ezili, Voodoo Monkey
-Race Events are here! Can you win the top badges?
-New Beginner Map: Alpine Run
-New Advanced Map: Peninsula
-The monkeys are busy preparing festive decorations and events!
-Various bug fixes and balance changes, see in-game Patch Notes for full list

New Intermediate Map: Karts'n'Darts
-New Hero Skin: Sentai Churchill
-Game launch optimization
-MOAB-class bloons have received a makeover
-Lots of balance changes, see patch notes in-game for complete list
-Various bug fixes, including end of Race crash
Minor bug fixes

New content update!
-New Hero: Pat Fusty
-New Hero Skin: Biker Bones
-New Advanced Map: Pat's Pond
-Challenge Editor! Build your own challenges and share them with friends!
-Sub Ballistic missile range fix
-Tech Bot and Energizing Totem now available in Powers Attack and Pandemonium packs
-Lane to lane round progression changed on Muddy Puddles
-Various other balance changes, bug fixes, race fixes, see in-game Patch Notes for full list

-True Sun God fix
-Spike factory smart targeting crash fixed
-Banana Farm now has a name again
-Offline crash on events panel fix
-Asset bundle download white square issue fixed

Easter content update!
-New Easter egg collection event
-New Intermediate map: Spring Spring
-New Hero Skin: Ocean Obyn
-Insta Monkey portraits updated
-Pat Fusty BAD popping issue resolved
-Various balance changes and bug fixes, see in-game Patch Notes for full list

-Fix for players stuck on 699 eggs in collection event
-Fix for some achievements incorrectly unlocking
-Fixes for 302 and permabrew alchemists

Co-op mode is HERE - and it's FOUR player!
-Anniversary beginner map: Park Path
-New advanced map: Cargo
-New Hero Skin: Benjammin'
-Tons of balance changes and bug fixes, see in-game Patch notes for full list

-Negative fireworks bug fix
-No fireworks being awarded bug fix
-Tower scrolling issue fixed
-Coop join bug fixed
-New "waiting for player" state added to co-op

-Fix for game locking at step 1 of 8
-Improvements to co-op network connection issue handling

This monkey slept late, lost his bus fare, and forgot his tool belt - but he's finally here! Say hello to Engineer Monkey!
And heaps more cool stuff:
- A new intoxicating Advanced Map: Spillway
- Newly engineered Expert Map: Workshop
- A purrfectly awesome Ezili Skin: Smudge Catt
- Co-op Daily Challenges now part of Daily Challenge rotation
- Heaps of balance changes and bug fixes (see in-game Patch notes for full list)
Minor bug fixes, including Heat it Up and Overclock issues.
Two awesome new maps and all the badges and Monkey Money that come with them - the frighteningly fun beginner map Carved and the chillingly challenging expert map Bloody Puddles!
Minor bug fixes

Mega update for the holidays!
- New Hero! Adora is a divine new Hero that no monkey temple should be without
- 2 new maps: festive Winter Park and mysterious Adora's Temple
- Fusty the Snowman skin
- Plus performance improvements, balance changes, and heaps of improvements!

Fixes for IMF loan, future race rewards and sandbox as well as other minor issues
Plus all of the cool holiday content:
- New Hero! Adora is a divine new Hero that no monkey temple should be without
- 2 new maps: festive Winter Park and mysterious Adora's Temple
- Fusty the Snowman skin
- Plus performance improvements, balance changes, and heaps of improvements!
Tap and hold fixed for Monkey Tower upgrades, Achievement fixes, and other minor bug fixes.

First update for 2020!
- New Expert Map: choose your monkey towers wisely on this Infernally tricky map
- Wolfpack Quincy brings a whole new look and voice to the original hero
- Player level cap increased to 155
- Five new Monkey Knowledge powers to unlock!
- New Insta Monkey Collection View
- Plus many bug fixes and improvements

Co-op daily challenge code join fix, Big Bloon Blueprint price correction, and other minor bug fixes.

First update for 2020!
- New Expert Map: choose your monkey towers wisely on this Infernally tricky map
- Wolfpack Quincy brings a whole new look and voice to the original hero
- Player level cap increased to 155
- Five new Monkey Knowledge powers to unlock!
- New Insta Monkey Collection View
- Plus many bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes

Community colab update!
Our first ever fan-designed, fan-voted Advanced map: Geared! Beware of moving parts.
Challenge editor update: Restrict Tiers and Paths to make Challenges more fiendish than ever before.
Adora skin: Joan of Arc!
Collection event update: Choose between specific insta-monkey types to fill out your collection faster.

Minor bug fixes including Spillway barrel, MIB buff icon and others

Community colab update! 
Our first ever fan-designed, fan-voted Advanced map: Geared! Beware of moving parts. 
Challenge editor update: Restrict Tiers and Paths to make Challenges more fiendish than ever before. 
Adora skin: Joan of Arc! 
Collection event update: Choose between specific insta-monkey types to fill out your collection faster.

Performance improvements and crash fixes

Community colab update! 
Our first ever fan-designed, fan-voted Advanced map: Geared! Beware of moving parts. 
Challenge editor update: Restrict Tiers and Paths to make Challenges more fiendish than ever before. 
Adora skin: Joan of Arc! 
Collection event update: Choose between specific insta-monkey types to fill out your collection faster.

Springing at you with a big new content update, including:
* The surprisingly delicious new map Candy Falls
* 3 cool new Monkey Knowledges to unlock
* The wickedly fun Gwendolin Hero skin - Harlegwen
* Music playlist control with the Jukebox
* Plus heaps of stability and balance improvements

Jukebox, Wizard, Darkshift, Achievement and Door Gunner fixes.

Springing at you with a big new content update, including:
* The surprisingly delicious new map Candy Falls
* 3 cool new Monkey Knowledges to unlock
* The wickedly fun Gwendolin Hero skin - Harlegwen
* Music playlist control with the Jukebox
* Plus heaps of stability and balance improvements

- Admiral on deck! A commanding new water Hero - Admiral Brickell!
- Two player requested Monkey Knowledge additions - Bank Deposits and Ambidextrous Rangs
- Play two new maps: colorful and spicy Bazaar, and the precarious Flooded Valley
- All new player stats screen with complete badge history
- Plus a bevy of balance changes, fixes, and quality of life improvements!

Mortar, stats screen and Tree Stump fixes

- Admiral on deck! A commanding new water Hero - Admiral Brickell!
- Two player requested Monkey Knowledge additions - Bank Deposits and Ambidextrous Rangs
- Play two new maps: colorful and spicy Bazaar, and the precarious Flooded Valley
- All new player stats screen with complete badge history
- Plus a bevy of balance changes, fixes, and quality of life improvements!

The Adventure Begins!
- All new Odyssey Mode links maps together in epic challenges with big Trophy rewards
- Trophy Store! Use your Trophies from Odysseys and Races to get awesomer cosmetics for Monkeys, Bloons, Co-op, and more!
- The intoxicatingly fun new beginner map Lotus Island
- Tentacular goodness with the new Striker skin - Octojones
- Lots of bug fixes and balance changes

Round 81+ cash corrected, Top 50 race rewards fixed, other minor fixes

The Adventure Begins!
- All new Odyssey Mode links maps together in epic challenges with big Trophy rewards
- Trophy Store! Use your Trophies from Odysseys and Races to get awesomer cosmetics for Monkeys, Bloons, Co-op, and more!
- The intoxicatingly fun new beginner map Lotus Island
- Tentacular goodness with the new Striker skin - Octojones
- Lots of bug fixes and balance changes

Round 81+ co-op cash corrected, Cyber Quincy memory fix, Spike Factory fixes

The Adventure Begins!
- All new Odyssey Mode links maps together in epic challenges with big Trophy rewards
- Trophy Store! Use your Trophies from Odysseys and Races to get awesomer cosmetics for Monkeys, Bloons, Co-op, and more!
- The intoxicatingly fun new beginner map Lotus Island
- Tentacular goodness with the new Striker skin - Octojones
- Lots of bug fixes and balance changes

New content update!
- Attack drones deployed! Welcome to the new air-based hero - Etienne!
- Master the new Advanced map - Mesa
- New Admiral Brickell skin - Dread Pirate Brickell
- Odyssey changes: summary stats added, odyssey achievements, replay completed difficulties, plus keep watch for the new Extreme mode!
- Trophy Store - 16 new items!
- Plus other improvements, bug fixes and balance changes

Odyssey farmer issue fixed, Mesa removables and Robo Monkey fix plus other minor issues resolved

New content update!
- Attack drones deployed! Welcome to the new air-based hero - Etienne!
- Master the new Advanced map - Mesa
- New Admiral Brickell skin - Dread Pirate Brickell
- Odyssey changes: summary stats added, odyssey achievements, replay completed difficulties, plus keep watch for the new Extreme mode!
- Trophy Store - 16 new items!
- Plus other improvements, bug fixes and balance changes

Spooky Halloween update!
• Decipher the new Intermediate Map - Encrypted
• Limited Time Trophy Store Items - get all the Halloween fun before it's gone!
• New "Monkeys" Trophy Category - pets, projectiles, and effects for Monkey Towers!
• 5 awesome new achievements
• Balance changes and quality of life fixes

Minor collection event fixes for the Spooky Halloween Update.

Update 21 Details:
• Decipher the new Intermediate Map - Encrypted
• Limited Time Trophy Store Items - get all the Halloween fun before it's gone!
• New "Monkeys" Trophy Category - pets, projectiles, and effects for Monkey Towers!
• 5 awesome new achievements
• Balance changes and quality of life fixes

Lock and load, everyone - the Dartling Gunner is here! 
And these are just the stars on top of this massive holiday update:
• Dartling Gunner tower, complete with glorious Tier 5 powers
• 3 Dartling Gunner Monkey Knowledges, plus 5 other new Knowledges
• Watch for penguins on the chilly new beginner map, Skates
• X marks the spot on the classically challenging advanced map X Factor
• All new Challenge Browser complete with likes, favorites, and filters
• 20 festive new Trophy Store items
• 10 New Achievements for your holiday reward hunting

Rocket Storm ability fix, co-op restart issue resolved, challenge browser improvements.

Draw steel and slice through Bloons like never before with the new Swordmaster Hero Sauda!

Big content update including Sauda and much more!
• Seek inner peace in the new Intermediate map - Balance
• Something fishy? Grab the new Benjamin skin - Sushi Bento
• Pop Golden Bloons on marked maps for bonus Monkey Money!
• 14 awesome new Trophy Store items
• Save file improvements
• Bloon info added to Defeat screen
• Balance tweaks and bug fixes

Minor bug fixes (missing upgrade sounds, fortified chocolate moabs)

New content update!
• Pop Bloons and chill out on the new Beginner map - Resort
• Get out of this world with the Etienne hero skin - ETn
• Earn more rewards in smaller groups in the Mini-Race leaderboards
• Sails Again sea shanty audio track added! Find it in the Jukebox

Damage type issues resolved for various upgrades.

• Pop Bloons and chill out on the new Beginner map - Resort

Check out another huge content update with a new Hero, Map, Odyssey Editor, and more!
•  Unleash your psychic potential with our latest hero, Psi!
•  Seek inner peace and tranquility on the new Expert map - Sanctuary
•  Odyssey Browser and Editor! Design your very own Odyssey and share it with friends!
•  Earn more Monkey Money with the new map bonus feature: Monkey Teams!
•  18 great new Trophy Store items
•  11 new Achievements added
•  Balance changes and other game improvements!

Monkey Teams, Odyssey Browser and Psi MIB issues resolved.

Epic Boss-sized content update!
• Boss Bloon Events have arrived! Who dares challenge Bloonarius?!
• Paragon Monkeys! Try out the all new Paragon Tier for Dart and Boomerang!
• Brave the swampy new Intermediate map: Bloonarius Prime
• New trophy store items: including brand new Profile Banners!
• Co-op rejoining: Get back into your co-op games!
• New achievements and rewards!
• Balance changes: some towers have had bigger changes, check the patch notes for more

Door gunner fix, boss trophies reward fix, other misc fixes.

Huge content update!
• Co-Op Boss Battles! Take on Boss Events with your friends for max Paragon levels!
• New Boss Bloon - Gravelord Lych!
• Boss Leaderboards! Choose Ranked Mode and set the best time on the leaderboards whether playing solo or co-op
• New Paragon Tower - Ninja Monkey Ascended Shadow has arrived!
• Viking Sauda has entered the fray! Grab the new Sauda skin and get slicin'!
• Don't split up or get lost in the woods on the new Beginner Map - The Cabin
• 12 new trophy store items, plus 6 all new Limited Time Halloween items - get them while you can!
• Balancing and fixes - plenty of changes, check the update notes for all the details!

Daily challenge bug fix, heli pilot patrol points fix, other minor changes.

Happy Holidays Season Update!
- Rule all waters with the latest Monkey Paragon: Navarch of the Seas
- Stop those rowdy Bloons in their tracks on the new intermediate map: Quiet Street
- Grab the awesome new Ezili skin: Galaxili!
- Co-op lobby creation revamped to get you in the game faster
- 17 new trophy store items including 6 new limited time ones, get them quick!
- New achievements, quality of life changes, balancing, and fixes - lots of great changes, check the update notes for all the details
Warmest Holiday Wishes and Happy New Years from all of us at Ninja Kiwi!

Huge Content Update!
- New Hero! Geraldo the Mystic Shopkeeper has arrived with his amazing emporium of Bloon-popping items!
- New Boss! Vortex, Deadly Master of Air has been unleashed!
- Have fun trashing the Bloons on the new Beginner map: Scrapyard
- 9 new Trophy Store items, including a new remix
- Challenge browser: Least Cash and Least Tiers special victory conditions added for your puzzle challenge enjoyment
- Heroes menu is new and improved plus more quality of life and balance changes, check the update notes for full details!
